message.body: you'll be pleased to know that i told don (relatively) directly that i didn't want to go to the show with him when he's here.
Well done. Do you feel better now?
no, i feel bad about it. i may have gone a little overboard because i'm so stressed out, but i just don't have the patience for him.
Well that's understandable. Try not to feel too bad about it. Focus on the positive. Did anything make you happy today?
eh, maybe... i don't remember. it was just a hard day because i can recognize the signs when i'm reaching like, max stress levels.
actually, i take it back, ling class was pretty good today, and seeing you afterward (though surprising) was an added bonus.
I promise i wasn't stalking. Though i did take a wrong turn today! An unexpected surprise!
